alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 4:01PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Dale and southern Henry Counties through 430 PM CDT... At 401 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Midland City to 8 miles northeast of Headland. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Abbeville, Headland, Ozark, Midland City, Newville, Haleburg, Sylvan Grove, Echo, Tumbleton, Kirkland Crossroads, Blackwood, Capps, Mabson, Ewell, Murphy Station, Browns Crossroads, Goldberg Field, Headland Municipal A/P, Blackwell Field A/p and Dancey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
